items.sentence: What\'s the craziest thing you\'ve ever done?

Registration starts the twentieth of October.

She advised him to stop taking that medicine.
The teacher compared my poem with one of his.
They regarded him as the best doctor in town.
This bar is much busier later in the evening.
Tom would\'ve gone to Boston if he could\'ve.
Tom wouldn\'t be alive if it wasn\'t for you.
